doc.title: 3029 TD
doc.plot: The film 'Day' focuses on the bleak future of asylum seekers being held at a government centre for asylum seekers in the small town of Hendrik Ido Ambacht in the Netherlands and their hopes of leading a normal life one day. Their harrowing situation is symbolised by the daily life of Soran Ismail as he waits at the asylum seekers centre and the railway station.

The film 'Day' focuses on the bleak future of asylum seekers being held at a government centre for asylum seekers in the small town of Hendrik Ido Ambacht in the Netherlands and their hopes of leading a normal life one day. Their harrowing situation is symbolised by the daily life of Soran Ismail as he waits at the asylum seekers centre and the railway station.
